form.title: Sign Up
form.terms: I accept the terms of privacy policy

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We highly value your privacy and want you to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.

points.1: We collect information about you to improve our service. For example, your email address is used for communication.
points.2: We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
points.3: Your data is secure and stored on reliable servers.

privacyPolicy.contact: Please contact us if you have any questions about our privacy policy.
